Configuring Costs and Transactions

Lesson |
objectives ¢ Describe the rating process and rating

architecture so that you can design and
configure rating effectively

* Configure the cost structure to store the
premiums and other monetary amounts of the
policy

¢ Access the changes in costs using the
transaction entity
